text: 'iina 'asabatkum -ayha almwmnwn- jrah 'aw qutil fi ghzw "'uhd" fhzntm ldhlk, faqad 'asab almushrikin jrah waqutil mithl dhlk fi ghzw "bdr". watilk al'ayaam yusarrifha allah bayn alnas, nasr maratan whzymt akhra, lamaa fi dhalik min alhkmt, hataa yuzhir ma ealamah allah fi alazl liamiz allah almumin alsadiq min ghyrh, wyukrim aqwamana minkum balshhad. wallah la yuhibu aladhin zalamuu anfshm, waqaeaduu ean alqital fi sbylh
